element.name: The Archivist’s Journal
element.prerequisite: Accursed Archive patron, Pact of the Tome feature

description.p: Prerequisite: Accursed Archive patron, Pact of the Tome feature

You gain advantage on saving throws while within the Archive. Whenever you cast a spell of 1st level or higher that deals damage, you can use your bonus action to cause one target of the spell to become vulnerable to the first instance of damage from a single type, rolled randomly on the table below. If the creature has resistance to the damage type, this resistance is ignored and vulnerability is applied instead. If the spell you cast deals that damage type, roll until you get a different result. Once you use this bonus action, you cannot do so again until you finish a short or long rest. [1) fire 2) cold 3) poison 4) necrotic]

sheet.description: You gain advantage on saving throws while within the Archive. Whenever you cast a spell of 1st level or higher that deals damage, you can cause one target of the spell to become vulnerable to the first instance of damage from a single type, rolled randomly on the table. If the creature has resistance to the damage type, this resistance is ignored and vulnerability is applied instead. If the spell you cast deals that damage type, roll until you get a different result. [1) fire 2) cold 3) poison 4) necrotic]

element.name: Butcher’s Quill
element.prerequisite: Accursed Archive patron, Pact of the Blade

description.p: Prerequisite: Accursed Archive patron, Pact of the Blade

Using your Pact of the Blade feature, you can create a weapon wrapped in raven feathers and the hide of abominations that drips and bleeds black ink. When you hit a creature with this weapon, you can cast a single 1st level spell you know with a casting time of one bonus action without expending a spell slot. Once you cast a spell in this way, you can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

sheet.description: When you hit a creature using a weapon from your Pact of the Blade feature, you can cast a single 1st level spell you know with a casting time of one bonus action without expending a spell slot.

element.name: Curse of Carasphyx
element.prerequisite: Accursed Archive patron

description.p: Prerequisite: Accursed Archive patron

Your flesh grows corrupt in appearance but is imbued with terrible might. While you are not wearing armor or using a shield, you can choose to have your AC equal 10 + your Strength modifier + your Charisma modifier.

sheet.description: While you are not wearing armor or using a shield, you can choose to have your AC equal {{ac:curse of carasphyx}}.

element.name: Scribe’s Adjunct
element.prerequisite: Accursed Archive patron, Pact of the Chain feature

description.p: Prerequisite: Accursed Archive patron, Pact of the Chain feature
While you have a record-hunter as your familiar, it gains additional maximum hit points equal to your warlock level and you gain the ability to cast the mending cantrip.

sheet.description: While you have a record-hunter as your familiar, it gains {{warlock:level}} additional maximum hit points. Additionally, you gain the ability to cast the mending cantrip.

element.name: Tenebrous Blast
element.prerequisite: Accursed Archive patron, 7th level

description.p: Prerequisite: Accursed Archive patron, 7th level

When you deal damage with a cantrip or hit a creature with a weapon attack, you can use a bonus action to unleash a shadowy blast of malevolent power. Choose one target of the cantrip or attack. The chosen creature suffers disadvantage on attack rolls targeting lightly obscured creatures until the end of their next turn.

sheet.description: When you deal damage with a cantrip or hit a creature with a weapon attack, choose one target of the cantrip or attack. The chosen creature suffers disadvantage on attack rolls targeting lightly obscured creatures until the end of their next turn.

element.name: Chronicle of the Flame
element.prerequisite: Ashen Wolf patron, Pact of the Tome feature

description.p: Ashen Wolf patron, Pact of the Tome feature

You can perform a ritual for the Wolf during a short or long rest. When you do so, choose either Dexterity or Strength saving throws. When you make a saving throw of this type, you can use your reaction to gain advantage on that saving throw and cast a cantrip with a casting time of one action. Once you use this invocation, you cannot do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

sheet.description: During a short or long rest choose either Dexterity or Strength saving throws. When you make a saving throw of this type, you can gain advantage on that saving throw and cast a cantrip with a casting time of one action.

element.name: Essence of Ash
element.prerequisite: Ashen Wolf patron, Pact of the Chain feature

description.p: Prerequisite: Ashen Wolf patron, Pact of the Chain feature

If you have an emberborn as your familiar, it gains additional hit points equal to your warlock level plus twice your Charisma modifier. When you reach 11th level, the emberborn can grow in size to become a Medium creature, at your discretion. While it is Medium, its bite attack deals 2d6 piercing damage and 2d6 fire damage, and the emberborn’s speed increases to 50 feet. Creatures hit by the bite attack must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. At 16th level, the Medium emberborn’s bite attack deals 3d6 piercing damage and 3d6 fire damage, and the Strength saving throw DC equals your warlock spell save DC.

sheet.description: If you have an emberborn as your familiar it gains {{essence of ash:health}} addtional hit points.

If you have an emberborn as your familiar it gains {{essence of ash:health}} addtional hit points. It can also grow to medium size at your descretion, when it is medium sized its bite attack deals 2d6 piercing damage and 2d6 fire damage, and its speed increases to 50 ft. Creatures hit by the bite attack must succeed a Strength saving throw (DC 13) or be knocked prone.

If you have an emberborn as your familiar it gains {{essence of ash:health}} addtional hit points. It can also grow to medium size at your descretion, when it is medium sized its bite attack deals 3d6 piercing damage and 3d6 fire damage, and its speed increases to 50 ft. Creatures hit by the bite attack must succeed a Strength saving throw (DC {{spellcasting:dc:cha}}) or be knocked prone.

element.name: Hellfire Infusion
element.prerequisite: Ashen Wolf patron

description.p: Prerequisite: Ashen Wolf patron

Whenever you cast a cantrip that deals damage or make a weapon attack, you can use your bonus action to empower it with elemental fire. The cantrip or attack deals fire damage instead of its normal damage type. When you do so, enemies within 5 feet of you take necrotic damage equal to your Charisma modifier as black ash bursts from your body.

sheet.description: Whenever you cast a cantrip that deals damage or make a weapon attack. The cantrip or attack deals fire damage instead of its normal damage type. When you do so, enemies within 5 feet of you take {{charisma:modifier}} necrotic damage.

element.name: Hide of Cinders
element.prerequisite: Ashen Wolf patron, Pact of the Blade

description.p: Prerequisite: Ashen Wolf patron, Pact of the Blade

You can summon a coating of embers and ash to cover your skin, protecting you from harm. You can choose to have your AC equal 10 + your Dexterity modifier + your Charisma modifier. If a creatures hits you with a melee attack while this armor is active, you can use your reaction to deal fire damage to the creature equal to your Charisma modifier.

sheet.description: You can choose to have your AC equal {{ac:hide of cinders}}. If a creatures hits you with a melee attack while this armor is active, deal {{charisma:modifier}} fire damage to the creature.

element.name: Hunger of the Wolf
element.prerequisite: Ashen Wolf patron

description.p: Prerequisite: Ashen Wolf patron

On your turn, when you score a critical hit with an attack roll or reduce a creature to 0 hit points, you can cast any cantrip that targets an enemy creature as a bonus action. Once you use this invocation, you can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

sheet.description: On your turn, when you score a critical hit with an attack roll or reduce a creature to 0 hit points, you can cast any cantrip that targets an enemy creature.

element.name: Scorched Blade
element.prerequisite: Ashen Wolf patron, Pact of the Blade

description.p: Prerequisite: Ashen Wolf patron, Pact of the Blade

You can create a wickedly barbed one-handed or versatile melee weapon made from embers and molten steel using your Pact of the Blade feature. You can choose to have this weapon deal fire damage. You can use your Charisma modifier for attack and damage rolls made with this weapon. Whenever a creature within your reach takes damage directly due to hitting you with an attack, such as from the effect of the fire shield spell, you can use your reaction to make an opportunity attack against your attacker using this weapon. If the spell or feature that would deal damage to the attacker requires a reaction, such as the Hide of Cinders invocation, you can make the opportunity attack as part of the same reaction. Once you do so, you can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

sheet.description: When you create a melee weapon with the one-handed or versatile property using your Pact of the Blade feature, you can choose to have it deal fire damage. You can use your Charisma modifier for attack and damage rolls made with this weapon. Whenever a creature within your reach takes damage directly due to hitting you with an attack, such as from the effect of the fire shield spell, you can use your reaction to make an opportunity attack against your attacker using this weapon. If the spell or feature that would deal damage to the attacker requires a reaction, such as the Hide of Cinders invocation, you can make the opportunity attack as part of the same reaction.

element.name: Through Fire and Flame
element.prerequisite: Ashen Wolf patron, 13th level

description.p: Prerequisite: Ashen Wolf patron, 13th level

Whenever you would take fire damage or are exposed to damaging flame, you can use your reaction to absorb the elemental fire as an offering to the Ashen Wolf. The damage is negated, and instead you gain temporary hit points equal to the amount of damage you would have taken before resistances and immunities. The amount of temporary hit points received at one time cannot exceed three times your Charisma modifier. You can use this invocation twice. You regain all uses of this invocation when you finish a short or long rest.

sheet.description: Whenever you would take fire damage or are exposed to damaging flame, you can absorb the elemental fire. The damage is negated, and instead you gain temporary hit points equal to the amount of damage you would have taken before resistances and immunities. The amount of temporary hit points received at one time cannot exceed {{fire and flame:temp hp}}.

element.name: Awakened Blade
element.prerequisite: Blackthorn Grove patron, Pact of the Blade

description.p: Prerequisite: Blackthorn Grove patron. Pact of the Blade

You can choose to create a weapon from polished black wood and wicked spines using your Pact of the Blade feature. While you maintain concentration on a spell cast using a warlock spell slot while wielding this weapon, dense foliage covers your skin, causing your AC to equal 17 if it would normally be lower.

sheet.description: While you maintain concentration on a spell cast using a warlock spell slot while wielding your Pact of the Blade weapon, dense foliage covers your skin, causing your AC to equal 17 if it would normally be lower.

element.name: Book of the Blackthorn
element.prerequisite: Blackthorn Grove patron. Pact of the Tome feature

description.p: Prerequisite: Blackthorn Grove patron, Pact of the Tome feature

During a short or long rest, you can choose to create an effigy from plant material, weaving and shaping it into a heart. Over the course of one minute, you can choose to replace the heart of a dead creature with this effigy, causing it to rise as a zombie with 1 hit point. The zombie will unerringly seek a path towards a destination you name at the time of this ritual. It will ignore any creatures it encounters and will not pause or stop unless it is destroyed. Once the zombie reaches its destination, it will fall to the ground and a sapling will sprout from the corpse. If you create a new effigy, the previous one ceases to function, and the zombie crumbles to the ground, a lifeless corpse once more.

sheet.description: During a short or long rest, you can choose to create an effigy from plant material, weaving and shaping it into a heart. Over the course of one minute, you can choose to replace the heart of a dead creature with this effigy, causing it to rise as a zombie with 1 hit point. The zombie will unerringly seek a path towards a destination you name at the time of this ritual. It will ignore any creatures it encounters and will not pause or stop unless it is destroyed. Once the zombie reaches its destination, it will fall to the ground and a sapling will sprout from the corpse. If you create a new effigy, the previous one ceases to function, and the zombie crumbles to the ground, a lifeless corpse once more.

element.name: Nightshade’s Embrace
element.prerequisite: Blackthorn Grove patron, 7th level

description.p: Prerequisite: Blackthorn Grove patron, 7th level

Whenever you deal damage with a cantrip or weapon attack, you can use your bonus action to attempt to overwhelm one target with a deadly poison. The next time the target takes bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage before the start of your next turn, they must they must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against your warlock spell save DC or become poisoned until the end of your next turn. While they are poisoned, they are also blinded.

sheet.description: Whenever you deal damage with a cantrip or weapon attack, you can attempt to overwhelm one target with a deadly poison. The next time the target takes bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage before the start of your next turn, they must they must succeed on a Constitution saving throw (DC {{spellcasting:dc:cha}}) or become poisoned until the end of your next turn. While they are poisoned, they are also blinded.

element.name: United Survival
element.prerequisite: Blackthorn Grove patron, Pact of the Chain feature

description.p: Prerequisite: Blackthorn Grove patron, Pact of the Chain feature

If you have a bloodless wanderer as your familiar, it gains additional hit points equal to your warlock level. As an action, you can touch a creature and transfer some of your life force to it. Sacrifice a number of hit points up to your warlock level. The target regains a number of hit points equal to the amount you sacrificed.

sheet.description: If you have a bloodless wanderer as your familiar, it gains {{level:warlock}} additional hit points. As an action, you can touch a creature and transfer some of your life force to it. Sacrifice a number of hit points up to {{level:warlock}}. The target regains a number of hit points equal to the amount you sacrificed.

element.name: Broker’s Blade
element.prerequisite: Currency Conspiracy patron, Pact of the Blade

description.p: Prerequisite: Currency Conspiracy patron, Pact of the Blade

You can choose to create a weapon from pure golden metal covered in precious gemstones using your Pact of the Blade feature. While you are wielding this weapon, you can choose to make an exchanging strike in place of a weapon attack. Make a Charisma (Persuasion) check contested by the target’s Wisdom (Insight) check. If you succeed, you trade the pact weapon in your hand for one object the target is currently holding, passing your blade to them and taking the item in one smooth motion. Creatures that are immune to the charmed condition are immune to this feature.

sheet.description: While you are wielding your Pact of the Blade weapon, you can choose to make an exchanging strike in place of a weapon attack. Make a Charisma (Persuasion) check contested by the target’s Wisdom (Insight) check. If you succeed, you trade the pact weapon in your hand for one object the target is currently holding, passing your blade to them and taking the item in one smooth motion. Creatures that are immune to the charmed condition are immune to this feature.

element.name: Contract Killer
element.prerequisite: Currency Conspiracy patron, Pact of the Tome feature

description.p: Prerequisite: Currency Conspiracy patron, Pact of the Tome feature

During a short or long rest, you can summon a contract detailing any agreement filled with your exact stipulations and requests. Any creature that signs the contract is bound by an obligation to fulfill the terms of the agreement for as long as the contract exists or until the terms are completed. If you break the agreement, you lose Gilt equal to three times your character level. If the amount lost is higher than your current total, you suffer force damage equal to twice the difference. If a creature other than you breaks the agreement, you can choose to spend an amount of Gilt equal to or less than five times your warlock level, dealing force damage equal to the amount spent to all offending parties. Once you either break the contract or inflict damage using this feature, the contract is destroyed and can no longer be enforced. You can have a maximum number of contracts in existence at one time equal to your Charisma modifier.

sheet.description: During a short or long rest, you can summon a contract detailing any agreement filled with your exact stipulations and requests. Any creature that signs the contract is bound by an obligation to fulfill the terms of the agreement for as long as the contract exists or until the terms are completed. If you break the agreement, you lose {{contract killer:glit loss}} Gilt. If the amount lost is higher than your current total, you suffer force damage equal to twice the difference. If a creature other than you breaks the agreement, you can choose to spend an amount of Gilt equal to or less than {{contract killer:glit sacrifice}}, dealing force damage equal to the amount spent to all offending parties. Once you either break the contract or inflict damage using this feature, the contract is destroyed and can no longer be enforced. You can have a maximum of {{charisma:modifier}} contracts in existence at one time.

element.name: Emergency Fund
element.prerequisite: Currency Conspiracy patron, 7th level

description.p: Prerequisite: Currency Conspiracy patron, 7th level

If all of your warlock spell slots have been expended, you can use your bonus action to spend Gilt equal to four times your warlock level to regain one warlock spell slot. Once you use this invocation, you can’t do so again until you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: If all of your warlock spell slots have been expended, you can spend {{emergency fund:glit sacrifice}} Gilt to regain one warlock spell slot.

element.name: Open Eyes
element.prerequisite: Currency Conspiracy patron, 7th level

description.p: Prerequisite: Currency Conspiracy patron, 7th level

Whenever you make a weapon attack or cast a cantrip that deals damage, you can use your bonus action to spend an amount of Gilt equal to or less than your warlock level to overwhelm the mind of your target with the truth of the Conspiracy. The target must make a Charisma saving throw against your warlock spell save DC. If they fail, they take psychic damage equal to half the amount of Gilt spent and can’t take reactions until the start of your next turn.

sheet.description: Whenever you make a weapon attack or cast a cantrip that deals damage, you can spend {{level:warlock}} Gilt to overwhelm the mind of your target with the truth of the Conspiracy. The target must make a Charisma saving throw (DC {{spellcasting:dc:cha}}). If they fail, they take psychic damage equal to half the amount of Gilt spent and can’t take reactions until the start of your next turn.

element.name: Perfect Appraisal
element.prerequisite: Currency Conspiracy patron

description.p: Prerequisite: Currency Conspiracy patron

You can correctly judge the value of any object, compared to any currency, and can tell the price that any person would be willing and able to pay for an object in your possession simply by looking at the person or thinking about a person you know well. You are also aware of the current net worth and liquid assets of any person you have met and greeted formally.

sheet.description: You can correctly judge the value of any object, compared to any currency, and can tell the price that any person would be willing and able to pay for an object in your possession simply by looking at the person or thinking about a person you know well. You are also aware of the current net worth and liquid assets of any person you have met and greeted formally.

element.name: Two of a Kind
element.prerequisite: Currency Conspiracy patron, Pact of the Chain feature

description.p: Prerequisite: Currency Conspiracy patron, Pact of the Chain feature

If you have a wealth mimic as your familiar, it gains additional hit points equal to your warlock level. While you have a wealth mimic as your familiar and you are attuned to an object, you can have your familiar become a perfect duplicate of the object during a short or long rest. It loses its normal statistics and gains any magical features of the object until it chooses to leave that form. It cannot duplicate features that rely on charges or limited uses.

sheet.description: If you have a wealth mimic as your familiar, it gains {{level:warlock}} additional hit points. While you have a wealth mimic as your familiar and you are attuned to an object, you can have your familiar become a perfect duplicate of the object during a short or long rest. It loses its normal statistics and gains any magical features of the object until it chooses to leave that form. It cannot duplicate features that rely on charges or limited uses.

element.name: Alliance Upheld
element.prerequisite: Eternal Citadel patron, 7th level

description.p: Prerequisite: Eternal Citadel patron, 7th level
Whenever you use your Righteous Guardian feature on an ally who has at least 1 hit point, they regain hit points equal to your Charisma modifier.

sheet.description: Whenever you use your Righteous Guardian feature on an ally who has at least 1 hit point, they regain {{charisma:modifier}} hit points.

element.name: Steadfast Companion
element.prerequisite: Eternal Citadel patron, Pact of the Chain feature

description.p: Prerequisite: Eternal Citadel patron, Pact of the Chain feature
If you have an animate shield as your familiar, it gains additional hit points equal to you warlock level. While you have this familiar, you can cast the mending and light cantrips.

sheet.description: If you have an animate shield as your familiar, it gains {{level:warlock}} additional hit points. While you have this familiar, you can cast the mending and light cantrips.

element.name: Hammer of Dawn
element.prerequisite: Eternal Citadel patron, Pact of the Blade

description.p: Prerequisite: Eternal Citadel patron, Pact of the Blade

You can create any weapon that inflicts bludgeoning damage from worked stone infused with golden metal using your Pact of the Blade feature. At creation, you can choose to have this weapon deal force damage instead of bludgeoning damage. You can use your Charisma modifier on attack and damage rolls made with this weapon. A target hit by this weapon cannot make opportunity attacks targeting creatures other than you until the start of your next turn.

sheet.description: You can choose to have your Pact of the Blade weapon deal force damage instead of bludgeoning damage. You can use your Charisma modifier on attack and damage rolls made with this weapon. A target hit by this weapon cannot make opportunity attacks targeting creatures other than you until the start of your next turn.

element.name: Invested Defense
element.prerequisite: Eternal Citadel patron, Pact of the Blade

description.p: Prerequisite: Eternal Citadel patron, Pact of the Blade
You gain proficiency in shields. While you are wielding your pact weapon, you are considered to have a shield equipped.

sheet.description: While you are wielding your pact weapon, you are considered to have a shield equipped.

element.name: Preserved Document
element.prerequisite: Eternal Citadel patron, Pact of the Tome feature

description.p: Prerequisite: Eternal Citadel patron, Pact of the Tome feature
You are instantly aware of any attempt by the other parties to break the terms of any contract or written agreement signed by you. If the contract is broken, you become aware of it.

sheet.description: You are instantly aware of any attempt by the other parties to break the terms of any contract or written agreement signed by you. If the contract is broken, you become aware of it.

element.name: Servants of the Citadel
element.prerequisite: Eternal Citadel patron

description.p: Prerequisite: Eternal Citadel patron

When you deal damage to a creature with a cantrip or weapon attack, you can use your bonus action to fortify an ally that you can see within 60 feet of you. The target gains temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier that last 1 minute.

sheet.description: When you deal damage to a creature with a cantrip or weapon attack, you can fortify an ally that you can see within 60 feet of you. The target gains {{charisma:modifier}} temporary hit points that last 1 minute.

element.name: Astrological Chart
element.prerequisite: Fallen Exile patron, Pact of the Tome feature

description.p: Prerequisite: Fallen Exile patron, Pact of the Tome feature

When a creature targets you with an attack, you can use your reaction to unleash a wave of sparkling light around yourself in a 10-foot radius. All invisible creatures and objects in the area are highlighted by glowing motes of stardust. Hostile creatures in the area must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your warlock spell save DC or become blinded until the start of your next turn. Once you use this ability, you cannot do so again until you finish a short or long rest. Additionally, you can’t become lost when you have an unobstructed view of the night sky, and you gain advantage on ability checks made to navigate at night.

sheet.description: When a creature targets you with an attack, you can unleash a wave of sparkling light around yourself in a 10-foot radius. All invisible creatures and objects in the area are highlighted by glowing motes of stardust. Hostile creatures in the area must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw (DC {{spellcasting:dc:cha}}) or become blinded until the start of your next turn. Additionally, you can’t become lost when you have an unobstructed view of the night sky, and you gain advantage on ability checks made to navigate at night.

element.name: Speck of Sunlight
element.prerequisite: Fallen Exile patron, Pact of the Chain feature

description.p: Prerequisite: Fallen Exile patron, Pact of the Chain feature
If you have a luminous shard as your familiar, it gains additional hit points equal to your warlock level, and it can teleport up to 30 feet using a bonus action.

sheet.description: If you have a luminous shard as your familiar, it gains {{level:warlock}} additional hit points, and it can teleport up to 30 feet using a bonus action.

element.name: Stolen Heart
element.prerequisite: Fallen Exile patron, Pact of the Blade

description.p: Prerequisite: Fallen Exile patron, Pact of the Blade

You can create a two-handed weapon made of smooth black metal impaling a gleaming gemstone using your Pact of the Blade feature. When you attack with this weapon, you can use your Charisma modifier, instead of Strength or Dexterity, for the attack and damage rolls. While wielding this weapon, you can choose to cast cantrips through your Cosmic Conduit feature, though the additional radiant damage or temporary hit points do not apply and you can’t do so with cantrips that require a weapon attack.

sheet.description: When you create a melee weapon with the two-handed property using your Pact of the Blade feature, you can use your Charisma modifier for the attack and damage rolls. While wielding this weapon, you can choose to cast cantrips through your Cosmic Conduit feature, though the additional radiant damage or temporary hit points do not apply and you can’t do so with cantrips that require a weapon attack.

element.name: The Exile’s Demand
element.prerequisite: Fallen Exile patron, 20th level

description.p: Prerequisite: Fallen Exile patron, 20th level
You can cast wish once without expending a spell slot. Once you do so, you can’t do so again until the sun rises at dawn after seven days have passed.

sheet.description: You can cast wish once without expending a spell slot. Once you do so, you can’t do so again until the sun rises at dawn after seven days have passed.

element.name: Ledger of the Deceased
element.prerequisite: Forbidden Graveyard patron, Pact of the Tome feature

description.p: Prerequisite: Forbidden Graveyard patron, Pact of the Tome feature

Whenever a creature that you can see within 120 feet of you dies or you touch a corpse, you can choose to have their name be magically inscribed in your Book of Shadows. That creature’s corpse is always considered to be present and whole within your Book. If your Book of Shadows is destroyed, all the names within are lost.

sheet.description: Whenever a creature that you can see within 120 feet of you dies or you touch a corpse, you can choose to have their name be magically inscribed in your Book of Shadows. That creature’s corpse is always considered to be present and whole within your Book. If your Book of Shadows is destroyed, all the names within are lost.

element.name: Creature of Carrion
element.prerequisite: Forbidden Graveyard patron, Pact of the Chain feature

description.p: Prerequisite: Forbidden Graveyard patron, Pact of the Tome feature

If you have a haunted crow as your familiar, it gains additional hit points equal to your warlock level. While you have this familiar, it recovers a single use of its Shriek action whenever either of you reduces a creature to 0 hit points, and the saving throw DC of this action equals your warlock spell save DC.

sheet.description: If you have a haunted crow as your familiar, it gains {{level:warlock}} additional hit points. While you have this familiar, it recovers a single use of its Shriek action whenever either of you reduces a creature to 0 hit points, and the saving throw DC of this action is {{spellcasting:dc:cha}}.

element.name: Eyes of the Lost
element.prerequisite: Forbidden Graveyard patron

description.p: Prerequisite: Forbidden Graveyard patron

As an action, you can choose to perceive through the senses of an undead creature within 120 feet of you until the start of your next turn. During this time, you are deaf and blind with regard to your own senses.

sheet.description: You can choose to perceive through the senses of an undead creature within 120 feet of you until the start of your next turn. During this time, you are deaf and blind with regard to your own senses.

element.name: Grim Guardian
element.prerequisite: Forbidden Graveyard patron, 7th level

description.p: Prerequisite: Forbidden Graveyard patron, 7th level

While asleep, you gain resistance to all damage, and you automatically awaken when a hostile creature is within 15 feet of you. If you awaken in this way, you gain advantage on your first initiative roll within 1 minute.

sheet.description: While asleep, you gain resistance to all damage, and you automatically awaken when a hostile creature is within 15 feet of you. If you awaken in this way, you gain advantage on your first initiative roll within 1 minute.

element.name: Scythe of the Lifetaker
element.prerequisite: Forbidden Graveyard patron, Pact of the Blade

description.p: Prerequisite: Forbidden Graveyard patron, Pact of the Blade

You can create a two-handed weapon of polished bone and golden metal using your Pact of the Blade feature. This weapon deals radiant damage instead of its normal damage type. When you attack with this weapon, you can use your Charisma modifier, instead of Strength or Dexterity, for the attack and damage rolls. On a hit, you can cast healing word as a bonus action using a warlock spell slot.

sheet.description: When you create a melee weapon with the two-handed property using your Pact of the Blade feature it deals radiant damage instead of its normal damage type. When you attack with this weapon, you can use your Charisma modifier, instead of Strength or Dexterity, for the attack and damage rolls. On a hit, you can cast healing word as a bonus action using a warlock spell slot.

element.name: Soul-Burning Incantation
element.prerequisite: Forbidden Graveyard patron

description.p: Prerequisite: Forbidden Graveyard patron

Whenever you cast a cantrip that deals damage or make a weapon attack, you can use your bonus action to empower it with cruel energy. Each target hit gains disadvantage on ability checks until the start of their next turn. If an empowered attack reduces a target to 0 hit points or is used to attack a corpse, the target can’t be raised as undead or resurrected by an effect or spell cast using a spell slot lower than 6th level

When you finish, an unnatural storm with a 1-mile radius rolls in and follows you, gently raining and occasionally flashing with lightning. When you reduce a creature to 0 hit points while outside, you can use your reaction to call down a bolt of lightning to strike the downed creature. You gain resistance to lightning and thunder damage for 1 minute, and each creature that you choose within a 10-foot radius of the strike must make a Constitution saving throw (DC {{spellcasting:dc:cha}}). If they fail, they take {{level:warlock}} thunder damage and are deafened for 1 minute.

element.name: Windswept Defense
element.prerequisite: Storm Lord patron, 3rd level

description.p: Prerequisite: Storm Lord patron, 3rd level
Whenever a hostile creature damages you with an attack or spell, you can take the Dash action as a bonus action once before the end of your next turn.

sheet.description: Whenever a hostile creature damages you with an attack or spell, you can take the Dash action once before the end of your next turn.

element.name: All Else Equal
element.prerequisite: Warrior Saint patron, 7th level

description.p: Prerequisite: Warrior Saint patron, 7th level
Whenever you cast a spell with the word “smite” in the name, you can choose to have it function with any weapon attack, rather than only melee weapon attacks.

sheet.description: Whenever you cast a spell with the word “smite” in the name, you can choose to have it function with any weapon attack, rather than only melee weapon attacks.

element.name: Between the Worlds
element.prerequisite: Warrior Saint patron, 16th level

description.p: Prerequisite: Warrior Saint patron, 16th level
You can cast plane shift without expending a spell slot. Once you cast this spell in this way, you can’t do so again until you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: You can cast plane shift without expending a spell slot.

element.name: Broken God's Blade
element.prerequisite: Warrior Saint patron, Pact of the Blade

description.p: Prerequisite: Warrior Saint patron, Pact of the Blade

You can create a weapon of polished starsteel capped with a shining gemstone using your Pact of the Blade feature. Whenever you strike a creature with this weapon, you can choose to unleash a wave of magical force to push them up to 15 feet directly away from you. If this causes them to strike a surface, they and the surface take 1d6 bludgeoning damage. You can choose to use your Charisma modifier for attack and damage rolls with this weapon.

sheet.description: Whenever you strike a creature with a weapon from your Pact of the Blade feature, you can choose to unleash a wave of magical force to push them up to 15 feet directly away from you. If this causes them to strike a surface, they and the surface take 1d6 bludgeoning damage. You can choose to use your Charisma modifier for attack and damage rolls with this weapon.

element.name: Scripture of Natural Law
element.prerequisite: Warrior Saint patron, Pact of the Tome feature

description.p: Prerequisite: Warrior Saint patron, Pact of the Tome feature
You can cast zone of truth once without expending a spell slot. This use recovers whenever you finish a short or long rest. You automatically succeed on saving throws against this spell.

sheet.description: You can cast zone of truth once without expending a spell slot. You automatically succeed on saving throws against this spell.

element.name: Servant-Priests
element.prerequisite: Warrior Saint patron, pact of the chain feature

description.p: Prerequisite: Warrior Saint patron, pact of the chain feature
While you have a scribeant swarm as your familiar, it gains additional maximum hit points equal to your warlock level, and you gain advantage on Investigation and Perception checks.

sheet.description: While you have a scribeant swarm as your familiar, it gains an additional {{level:warlock}} maximum hit points, and you gain advantage on Investigation and Perception checks.

element.name: Titanic Might
element.prerequisite: Warrior Saint patron, level 16

description.p: Prerequisite: Warrior Saint patron, level 16
Righteous power flows through your body. You count as one size larger for the purposes of grappling and encumbrance, and you gain immunity to falling damage and damage from being forcibly moved.

sheet.description: You count as one size larger for the purposes of grappling and encumbrance, and you gain immunity to falling damage and damage from being forcibly moved.

element.name: Will of the Saint
element.prerequisite: Warrior Saint patron

description.p: Prerequisite: Warrior Saint patron

You can choose to have your AC equal 13 + your Strength modifier, as the robes of the Warrior-Saint cover your armor and flesh to protect you from harm. A shield's benefits apply as normal. Additionally, you can bypass the effects of the nondetection spell as the Saint's impartial gaze comes more easily to you.

sheet.description: You can choose to have your AC equal {{ac:will of the saint}}, a shield's benefits apply as normal. Additionally, you can bypass the effects of the non-detection spell.

element.name: Acolytes of the Arachnid
element.prerequisite: Weaver of Lies patron, Pact of the Tome feature

description.p: Prerequisite: Weaver of Lies patron, Pact of the Tome feature

Whenever you finish a short or long rest, you can perform a weaving ritual over the course of 10 minutes. When you finish, you can touch a number of creatures equal to your Charisma modifier. These creatures are immune to the web spell or natural webbing and climbing costs no extra movement while the creature is touching a web. This lasts until that creature finishes a short or long rest.

sheet.description: Whenever you finish a short or long rest, you can perform a weaving ritual over the course of 10 minutes. When you finish, you can touch {{charisma:modifier}} creatures. These creatures are immune to the web spell or natural webbing and climbing costs no extra movement while the creature is touching a web. This lasts until that creature finishes a short or long rest.

element.name: Assassin in the Dark
element.prerequisite: Weaver of Lies patron, pact of the chain feature

description.p: Prerequisite: Weaver of Lies patron, pact of the chain feature

If you have a shade widow as your familiar, it gains additional hit points equal to your warlock level. Whenever it uses the Bite action, you can use your reaction to impose disadvantage on the target's first Constitution saving throw.

sheet.description: If you have a shade widow as your familiar, it gains {{level:warlock}} additional hit points. Whenever it uses the Bite action, you can use your reaction to impose disadvantage on the target's first Constitution saving throw.

element.name: Binding Blast
element.prerequisite: Weaver of Lies patron, eldritch blast cantrip

description.p: Prerequisite: Weaver of Lies patron, eldritch blast cantrip

Whenever you cast eldritch blast, you can use a bonus action to send transparent webbing to bind all targets that you've hit with your eldritch blast. All targets must make a Wisdom saving throw against your warlock spell save DC. Those that fail cannot move farther away from others that have also failed until the beginning of your next turn, as ethereal webbing ties them together.

sheet.description: Whenever you cast eldritch blast, you can send transparent webbing to bind all targets that you've hit with your eldritch blast. All targets must make a Wisdom saving throw (DC {{spellcasting:dc:cha}}). Those that fail cannot move farther away from others that have also failed until the beginning of your next turn, as ethereal webbing ties them together.

element.name: Blasphemous Whisper
element.prerequisite: Weaver of Lies patron, level 7

description.p: Prerequisite: Weaver of Lies patron, level 7
You can activate the Poisoned Mind feature whenever you cast a cantrip that targets only one enemy creature.

sheet.description: You can activate the Poisoned Mind feature whenever you cast a cantrip that targets only one enemy creature.

element.name: Lair of the Liar
element.prerequisite: Weaver of Lies patron, level 7

description.p: Prerequisite: Weaver of Lies patron, level 7

You can cast the web spell once without expending a spell slot. Once you do so, you cannot do so again until you finish a short or long rest. Whenever you cast web and maintain concentration for the full duration, you can choose to have the web become permanent and impossible to dispel.

sheet.description: You can cast the web spell once without expending a spell slot. Whenever you cast web and maintain concentration for the full duration, you can choose to have the web become permanent and impossible to dispel.

element.name: The Silver Tongue
element.prerequisite: Weaver of Lies patron, pact of the blade

description.p: Prerequisite: Weaver of Lies patron, pact of the blade

You can create a finesse weapon made of silver and bone using your Pact of the Blade feature. This weapon deals psychic damage. Whenever you strike a creature with this weapon, you can choose to inflict no damage. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw against your warlock spell save DC. If they fail, they are charmed by you until the start of your next turn and will not take hostile actions against you, but may target your companions.

sheet.description: When you create a melee weapon with the finesse property using your Pact of the Blade feature, it deals psychic damage. Whenever you strike a creature with this weapon, you can choose to inflict no damage. When you do, the target must make a Wisdom saving throw (DC {{spellcasting:dc:cha}}). If they fail, they are charmed by you until the start of your next turn, and will not take hostile actions against you, but may target your companions.

element.name: Bitterchill Blast
element.prerequisite: Wild Huntsman patron

description.p: Your Black Ice feature can trigger when you cast a cantrip that requires a saving throw. When you use your Black Ice feature, you can choose to have that cantrip or attack deal cold damage instead of its normal damage type. If the target takes damage from the attack or cantrip, it can’t benefit from features or effects that allow it to ignore difficult terrain until the start of your next turn.

sheet.description: Your Black Ice feature can trigger when you cast a cantrip that requires a saving throw. When you use your Black Ice feature, you can choose to have that cantrip or attack deal cold damage instead of its normal damage type. If the target takes damage from the attack or cantrip, it can’t benefit from features or effects that allow it to ignore difficult terrain until the start of your next turn.

element.name: Chronicle of the Winter Past
element.prerequisite: Wild Huntsman patron

description.p: As an action, you infuse yourself with the cruel bite of ice from ages long past. For 1 minute, cold damage you deal ignores resistance and immunity and you gain immunity to cold damage.
Once you use this invocation, you can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

sheet.description: You infuse yourself with the cruel bite of ice from ages long past. For 1 minute, cold damage you deal ignores resistance and immunity and you gain immunity to cold damage.

element.name: Frostbound Armor
element.prerequisite: 5th level, Wild Huntsman patron

description.p: You gain proficiency in medium armor and heavy armor.

sheet.description: You gain proficiency in medium armor and heavy armor.

element.name: Grim Harvester
element.prerequisite: Wild Huntsman patron

description.p: As an action, you can harvest a small trophy from the corpse of a creature that you have slain. You fill the trophy with a fraction of the slain creature’s soul. Until the next dawn, you can use your reaction to siphon the spiritual energy from the trophy in your possession to gain advantage on an attack roll, skill check, or saving throw. Each trophy can only be used once. You can use this feature twice, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a short or long rest.

sheet.description: You can harvest a small trophy from the corpse of a creature that you have slain. You fill the trophy with a fraction of the slain creature’s soul. Until the next dawn, you can use your reaction to siphon the spiritual energy from the trophy in your possession to gain advantage on an attack roll, skill check, or saving throw. Each trophy can only be used once.

element.name: Lord of Beasts
element.prerequisite: 13th level, Wild Huntsman patron

description.p: Your pack gains a bonus to its attack and damage rolls equal to half your Charisma modifier, and the saving throw associated with its attack equals 8 + your proficiency bonus + half your Charisma modifier (rounded down). If you have a familiar, it also gains these bonuses.

sheet.description: Your pack gains a bonus to its attack and damage rolls equal to {{charisma:modifier:half}}, and the saving throw associated with its attack is {{lord of beasts:dc}}. If you have a familiar, it also gains these bonuses.

element.name: Seeker of Prey
element.prerequisite: Wild Huntsman patron, Pact of the Chain feature

description.p: When you have a harrowing hawk as your familiar, it gains additional hit points equal to your warlock level, you can communicate telepathically with your hounds and steed from up to ten miles away, and you can perceive through their senses in the same way you can with your familiar.

sheet.description: When you have a harrowing hawk as your familiar, it gains {{level:warlock}} additional hit points, you can communicate telepathically with your hounds and steed from up to ten miles away, and you can perceive through their senses in the same way you can with your familiar.

element.name: Slayer's Armor
element.prerequisite: Wild Huntsman patron, Pact of the Blade feature

description.p: You can now create any simple or martial weapon from blackened cold iron and the bone of ancient beasts using your Pact of the Blade feature. If this weapon is a ranged weapon, you can instantly create ammunition for it in your open hand. Whenever you hit a creature with this weapon while they are the subject of hunter’s mark, the target takes an extra 1d6 cold damage. You can choose to use Strength for attack and damage rolls with this pact weapon, even if it is ranged.

If this weapon is a ranged weapon, you can instantly create ammunition for it in your open hand. Whenever you hit a creature with this weapon while they are the subject of hunter’s mark, the target takes an extra 1d6 cold damage.
